required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Irinotecan Hydrochloride Liposome in Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ia Study on Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Irinotecan Hydrochloride Liposome Alone in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open label, dose-escalation and expansion, single centre, phase Ia study . In this study, the tolerability, safety, pharmacokinetics and efficacy of irinotecan hydrochloride liposome injection were studied in patients with advanced solid tumors, to determine the dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) and maximum tolerated dose (MTD) of irinotecan hydrochloride liposome.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A dose-escalation（3+3 design） and expansion study

primary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed from study inclusion to 30 days after last dose
DLTs will be evaluated during 21-day period following the first dose of study treatment
primary_outcome.description: Dose limiting toxicities for patients in the treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: after the last patient in each cohort up to 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Maximum tolerated dose for patients in the treatment

secondary_outcome.description: Objective response rate was based on response evaluation criteria in solid tumors 1.1 (RECIST 1.1)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The maximum time in follow up was 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Progression-free survival was defined as the time from the date of randomization to the date of disease progression, or death (any cause) on or prior to the clinical cutoff date, whichever occurs first.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum plasma concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 120 hours after the first dose
secondary_outcome.description: Tmax of total irinotecan, free irinotecan and SN-38

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 120 hours after the first dose
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax of total irinotecan, free irinotecan and SN-38

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time zero to time of last observed concentration (AUC0-t)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 120 hours after the first dose
secondary_outcome.description: AUC0-t of total irinotecan, free irinotecan and SN-38

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time zero to infinity (AUC0-inf)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 120 hours after the first dose
secondary_outcome.description: AUC0-inf of total irinotecan, free irinotecan and SN-38

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 120 hours after the first dose
secondary_outcome.description: T1/2 of total irinotecan, free irinotecan and SN-38

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 120 hours after the first dose
up to 120 hours after the first dose
